thread.title: Demi Lovato and Tori Kelly's Bee Gees Tribute Is Kiiind of Legendary, You Guys
thread.title_full: Demi Lovato and Tori Kelly's Bee Gees Tribute Is Kiiind of Legendary, You Guys

author: Maggie Pehanick
title: Demi Lovato and Tori Kelly's Bee Gees Tribute Is Kiiind of Legendary, You Guys
text:
Bee Gees Tribute Video at the 2017 Grammys Demi Lovato and Tori Kelly's Bee Gees Tribute Is Kiiind of Legendary, You Guys February 12, 2017 by Maggie Pehanick 320 Shares 
On Sunday, Demi Lovato ( rocking a crazy-cool look ), Tori Kelly, Little Big Town, and Andra Day came together to pay tribute to one of the greatest musical acts of all time (yeah, I said it), the Bee Gees. This year marks the 40th anniversary of Saturday Night Fever and its legendary soundtrack, and the medley proves that some of those songs, like "How Deep Is Your Love" and "Stayin' Alive," will always be in style . . . unlike John Travolta 's white disco suit.
